縱.definition: vertical; north-south (Taiwan pr. [zong1]); from front to back; longitudinal; lengthwise (Taiwan pr. [zong1]); military unit corresponding to an army corps (Taiwan pr. [zong1]); (bound form) to release (a captive); to indulge; to leap up; (literary) even if

縱令.definition: to indulge; to give free rein; even if

縱橫.definition: lit. warp and weft in weaving; vertically and horizontal; length and breadth; criss-crossed; able to move unhindered; abbr. for 合縱連橫|合纵连横[He2 zong4 Lian2 heng2], School of Diplomacy during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)

縱橫家.definition: School of Diplomacy of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC) whose leading advocates were Su Qin 蘇秦|苏秦[Su1 Qin2] and Zhang Yi 張儀|张仪[Zhang4 Yi2]

縱橫馳騁.definition: to criss-cross; to run unhindered across the whole country

縱深.definition: depth (from front to rear); depth (into a territory); span (of time); (fig.) depth (of deployment, progress, development etc)

縱火.definition: to set on fire; to commit arson

縱目.definition: as far as the eye can see

縱紋綠鵯.definition: (bird species of China) striated bulbul (Alcurus striatus)

縱紋腹小鴞.definition: (bird species of China) little owl (Athene noctua)

縱紋角鴞.definition: (bird species of China) pallid scops owl (Otus brucei)

縱虎歸山.definition: lit. to let the tiger return to the mountain; fig. to store up future calamities

縱觀.definition: to survey comprehensively; an overall survey

縱貫.definition: lit. warp string in weaving; fig. vertical or north-south lines; to pass through; to cross lengthwise; to pierce (esp. north-south or top-to-bottom)

縱身.definition: to leap; to spring; to throw oneself

縱隊.definition: column; file (formation of people) (CL:列[lie4],路[lu4]); PLA army corps (1946-1949) (CL:個|个[ge4])

縱隔.definition: mediastinum (organs and tissues in the thorax between the lungs)
